about_the_game:
"Coreless" is a third-person action roguelike game that brings a unique twist to meta-progression with its versatile talent and power system. Choose from a diverse range of avatars, enhance them with talent points, and research and arm them with unique powers. Each adventure promises challenging endeavors and distinctive experiences.

Highly Customizable Avatars

Employ a wide variety of talents and powers to craft your unique avatar. Whether you dream of a spellcaster wielding powerful attacks from a distance, a melee warrior with magical talents, or an assassin summoning minions for distractions, the choice is yours. Unlock new avatars, research options, and powers to create a truly distinctive build!

Resource Collection, Research, and Powers

As you journey through adventures, collect resources to invest in the research facility and shop, unlocking new level encounters and enhancing powers to equip your avatars. Dozens of powers can be unlocked, significantly augmenting your avatars’ battle performance. As you advance your profile level, you’ll earn new talent points to further enhance your avatars with powerful traits and increased capacity to equip more powers, enabling even more diverse builds.

Challenging and Diverse Encounters

Every run overflows with plentiful upgrade choices, challenging yet rewarding foes, and concealed unlockables waiting to be found. Players must optimize their growth during each node encounter before the Heat Meter hits 100%, signaling the arrival of a formidable boss. Defeating these unique adversaries grants generous loot to bolster future journeys.

Continuous Progression

With every challenge and setback, players learn and evolve. You’ll consistently earn new permanent upgrades, whether they be talent points, resources, powers, or research items, unveiling novel strategies for future runs.

Multiplayer Experience

Embark on an adventure with up to three friends, each adopting a preferred playstyle as you progress. Fancy being the sniper while a buddy serves as the tank drawing aggro? Or perhaps you see yourself in a support role, enhancing your team's prowess against formidable adversaries? The combination of robust RPG elements with multiplayer dynamics unfurls a tapestry of endless gaming possibilities, shaped by individual character upgrades during each run.
